Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes' late penalty gave Cape Verde a dramatic 1-0 win over Mauritania
Yassin El Welly's mistake led to Gilson Benchimol being brought down and awarded a penalty
Post-Match Reflections: A cruel end to a brilliant AFCON run for Mauritania
Cape Verde have done it! They are through to the quarter-finals, Ryan Mendes' penalty is enough for victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: One mistake was all it took though, as Yassin El Welly tried to head the ball back to his goalkeeper and instead nodded it perfectly into the path of Gilson Benchimol
